item.title: 10 Best MI and Xiaomi Smart TVs That Offer An Impressive Viewing Experience - The Economic Times
item.description:
10 Best MI and Xiaomi Smart TVs That Offer An Impressive Viewing Experience

Publication Date: Not provided Source: Economic Times

This article reviews the top 10 MI and Xiaomi Smart TVs that stand out for their exceptional picture quality, sound, and innovative features.

Key Points

  • Explores features like 4K resolution, QLED technology, and Dolby Audio.
  • Highlights TVs of various sizes from 32 to 75 inches.
  • Provides information on pricing and discounts.
  • Includes pros and cons of each TV model.
  • Offers insights into the specifications and connectivity options.

Notable Quotes or Statistics

"The invention of Smart TVs over the last decade has really changed the way we consume content."

Conclusion

MI and Xiaomi Smart TVs offer an impressive viewing experience with their advanced technology and affordable pricing, making them a popular choice in the market.

item.title: Merchant network at the core of Fino’s small finance bank bid | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Merchant network at the core of Fino’s small finance bank bid

Publication Date: December 2023, Source: Live Mint

Fino Payments Bank is seeking to convert into a small finance bank, planning to utilize its extensive merchant network for lending and loan collection services.

  • Fino has about 1.8 million merchants providing financial services.
  • The proposal was made to the regulator for approval in December 2023.
  • Managing Director Rishi Gupta emphasized the potential of merchants as loan collection points.
“A significant portion of these merchants can be used to collect loan repayments.” - Rishi Gupta

This proposal marks a strategic move by Fino Payments Bank to expand its customer base while leveraging existing resources effectively.

item.title: ChatGPT adds more PC and Mac app integrations, getting closer to piloting your computer - VentureBeat
item.description:
ChatGPT adds more PC and Mac app integrations, getting closer to piloting your computer

Publication Date: Not provided Source: VentureBeat

OpenAI has expanded the number of applications its desktop apps can work with, moving closer to integrating ChatGPT with computers.

  • New integrations include coding IDEs like BBEdit, Nova, and the JetBrains family.
  • Additional applications like Apple Notes and Notion now supported, enhancing Advanced Voice Mode capabilities.
  • Users must grant permission for ChatGPT to access these applications.
  • OpenAI aims for a more agentic user experience with multiple application integrations.
  • Improved desktop functionality may allow ChatGPT to automate tasks on users' desktops in the future.
“As our models get increasingly powerful, ChatGPT will more and more become agentic.” - Kevin Weil, Chief Product Officer at OpenAI

The enhanced capabilities of ChatGPT signal a shift towards more integrated and intelligent desktop interactions, promising a transformative user experience.

item.title: Gemini app widely rolling out 2.0 Flash model switcher on Android - 9to5Google
item.description:
Gemini app widely rolling out 2.0 Flash model switcher on Android

Publication Date: December 19, 2024 Source: 9to5Google

The Gemini app, powered by Google, is rolling out version 15.50 to stable Android users, introducing the 2.0 Flash Experimental model switcher.

  • The 2.0 Flash Experimental model is accessible to both free and Advanced users.
  • This new model promises double the speed compared to its predecessor, 1.5 Pro, while being in the experimental phase.
  • Users can select from various options including 1.5 Pro and 1.5 Flash.
  • Availability for developers is set for January, with more model sizes to come.
While we’re excited for you to try it, remember it’s an early preview and might not work as expected. Additionally, some Gemini features won’t be compatible with this model in its experimental state.

Users on iPhone have also received updates for 2.0 Flash access, with more features expected in the coming months.

item.title: Android 15 QPR1 Beta 3.1 to stable update now available for Pixel - 9to5Google
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: You can turn ChatGPT into Santa Claus this holiday season - YTECHB
item.description:
ChatGPT Introduces Santa Voice for Christmas 2025

Date: December 2024 Source: YTechB

OpenAI has introduced a new Santa Voice feature in ChatGPT for Christmas 2025, allowing users to engage in festive conversations.

  • The Santa Voice feature is available until early January 2025.
  • Users can access Santa Mode on ChatGPT's web, PC, and mobile applications.
  • Instructions on how to activate Santa Mode are provided for both web and mobile platforms.
  • ChatGPT can be used to generate personalized Christmas wishes and greeting cards.
  • The feature aims to bring joy to families, especially during the holiday season.
“It’s the era of artificial intelligence, so let’s make the best use of it to bring joy and happiness to everyone around us.”

This new feature enhances the festive experience and encourages users to utilize AI for creativity during the holiday season.

item.title: Nothing rolling out Android 15-based Nothing OS 3.0 for Phone (2), Phone (2a) - The Times of India
item.description:
Nothing Rolls Out Android 15-Based Nothing OS 3.0 for Phone (2) and Phone (2a)

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

Nothing has announced the rollout of its Nothing OS 3.0, based on Android 15, for its Phone (2) and Phone (2a) models, aiming to enhance user experience and deliver innovative features.

  • Nothing OS 3.0 based on Android 15 is now available for Phone (2) and Phone (2a).
  • The update includes various new features aimed at improving system performance.
  • Users can expect enhanced privacy settings and UI improvements.
  • This update is part of Nothing's commitment to provide regular software enhancements.
“Our goal is to deliver significant software improvements regularly, ensuring our users get the best experience possible.”

This update reflects Nothing's dedication to keeping their devices modern and user-friendly, cementing its position in the competitive smartphone market.

item.title: Smart TVs for under Rs 6,000? These brands are rocking the market with unbelievable deals - India TV News
item.description:
Smart TVs for under Rs 6,000? These brands are rocking the market with unbelievable deals

Publication Date: N/A Source: India TV News

The Big Saving Days sale on Flipkart kicks off tonight, featuring incredible discounts on various products like smartphones and electronics, including affordable smart TVs from Thomson and Blaupunkt.

  • Blaupunkt’s 24Sigma707 smart TV for Rs 5,999, down from Rs 6,499.
  • Thomson’s 24Alpha001 smart TV also priced at Rs 5,999 with a similar discount.
  • Blaupunkt offers 4K smart TVs starting at Rs 22,499 with advanced features.
  • Thomson's 4K TVs range from Rs 20,499 to Rs 69,999 with significant discounts.
  • Complimentary sound bar offered with every purchase of a 4K model from Thomson.
"Exciting discounts of up to Rs 20,000 on smart TVs!"

As consumers prepare for the sale, the demand for affordable smart TVs is expected to rise, making it an excellent time for budget-conscious buyers to explore options in the market.

item.title: Sony now owns a much bigger piece of FromSoftware’s parent company - The Verge
item.description:
Sony now owns a much bigger piece of FromSoftware’s parent company

Publication Date: November 20, 2024 Source: The Verge

Sony has expanded its investment in Kadokawa Corporation, acquiring shares worth 50 billion yen ($300 million), resulting in a total 10 percent ownership and solidifying Sony as Kadokawa's largest shareholder.

  • Sony announced the acquisition, increasing its share in Kadokawa to 10%.
  • The deal is valued at approximately 50 billion yen ($300 million).
  • Kadokawa is known for its significant holdings in media, including video game development with titles like Elden Ring.
  • A potential acquisition by Sony was previously rumored, which would integrate Kadokawa's vast IP portfolio with Sony's.
  • Sony and Kadokawa are set to discuss future collaborations for adaptation and production of Kadokawa IP.
“Discuss specific initiatives for collaboration” - Sony Press Release

This move indicates Sony's strategic intent to enhance its intellectual property portfolio, possibly paving the way for projects like a live-action adaptation of Elden Ring.

item.title: Realme 14 Pro 5G Series Shown Off With Temperature-Sensitive Colour-Changing Rear Panel - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Realme 14 Pro 5G Series Can Change Panel Colour Based on Temperature

Date: Thursday
Source: Gadgets 360

Realme has unveiled the Realme 14 Pro 5G series, featuring a unique temperature-sensitive color-changing rear panel that alters its appearance when the temperature drops below 16 degrees Celsius.

  • The series comprises Realme 14 Pro and Realme 14 Pro+ models.
  • A temperature-sensitive back cover changes color from Pearl White to vibrant blue at low temperatures.
  • Co-created with Nordic design studio Valeur Designers, these models are claimed to be the first of their kind.
  • Scheduled for purchase starting January next year, featuring certifications for water and dust resistance (IP66, IP68, IP69).
  • Realme 14 Pro+ 5G has a triple rear camera system and a high screen-to-body ratio.
“The smartphones represent a fusion of technology and artistry through intricate craftsmanship using bio-based materials.”

This innovative series not only emphasizes technological advancement but also a focus on aesthetic appeal and sustainability.

item.title: Palit registers all possible variants of GeForce RTX 50 series at EEC - VideoCardz.com
item.description: No summary available for this article. Click the link to read more.

item.title: LG's transparent, wireless OLED TV is now available for $59,999 - TechSpot
item.description:
LG's Transparent Wireless OLED TV Now Priced at $59,999

Publication Date: December 19, 2024
Source: TechSpot

LG has launched its much-anticipated transparent OLED TV, priced at $59,999, which features wireless technology and a unique design that allows images to appear as if they are floating.

  • The 77-inch Signature OLED T is now available for purchase.
  • It includes a Zero Connect Box for wireless connectivity.
  • A T-Bar enhances functionality with status updates and information on the screen.
  • The TV operates in both transparent and opaque modes.
  • It features a 4K@120Hz display with advanced gaming capabilities.
“The benefits of a transparent set like this include being able to place it somewhere, like in front of a window, and still see what's behind it.”

The OLED T is aimed at high-end consumers looking for cutting-edge technology and unique aesthetics. Its availability at various top retailers marks a significant entry into the luxury tech market.

item.title: Poco C75, India's Cheapest 5G phone, on sale for Rs 282 a month - India TV News
item.description:
Poco C75, India's Cheapest 5G phone, on sale for Rs 282 a month

Publication Date: December 17, 2024

Source: India TV News

The Poco C75 smartphone, launched in India on December 17, is making headlines as the country’s most affordable 5G option, available for just Rs 282 per month.

  • The Poco C75 features a single storage variant: 4GB RAM + 64GB, priced at Rs 7,999.
  • Available in three colors: Aqua Bliss, Green, and Silver Stardust.
  • Customers can enjoy unlimited cashback of up to 5% when purchasing with a Flipkart Axis Bank card.
  • Additionally, the phone can be taken home with an EMI option of Rs 282.
  • Poco C75 is powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 processor.
“The POCO C75 5G is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 processor.”

This launch signifies competitiveness in India's 5G smartphone market, particularly for budget-conscious consumers.

item.title: Ray-Ban Smart Glasses Get Live AI, Live Translation And Shazam: All Details - News18
item.description:
Ray-Ban Smart Glasses Get Live AI, Live Translation And Shazam: All Details

Publication Date: December 19, 2024

Source: News18

Meta has updated its Ray-Ban smart glasses with new features including live AI, live translation, and music recognition via Shazam. These features are currently being rolled out to early access program participants in the US and Canada.

  • The new Live AI feature allows real-time interaction with the environment.
  • Live translation between English and languages such as Spanish, French, and Italian is introduced.
  • Music streaming capabilities have been added, allowing users to identify songs through voice activation.
  • These features were showcased by CEO Mark Zuckerberg during Meta Connect 2024.
  • Feedback is being solicited to improve the performance of these features.
“These updates make the Ray-Ban smart glasses significantly more practical for everyday users.”

The new features signal an enhancement of user experience for Ray-Ban smart glasses, creating potential utility in travel and daily interactions.

item.title: Huawei dethrones Apple as new king of the smartwatch market, report says - The Financial Express
item.description:
Huawei surpasses Apple in smartwatch sales, capturing market leadership with advanced models

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Financial Express

Till now, Apple had been ruling the technology market with its long list of products. However, recent reports reveal that Huawei has overtaken the smartwatch market, which was previously dominated by Apple.

  • Huawei has claimed the ‘best smartwatch’ award from Apple according to IDC.
  • The company sold the most smartwatches during the first nine months of the year.
  • New models like the GT5 and GT5 Pro feature advanced health-tracking capabilities.
  • Huawei’s strategy includes catering to local markets across regions like Asia-Pacific and Latin America.
  • China has seen a 20% increase in wrist-worn device shipments in 2024, indicating growing consumer interest.
“Chinese consumers are quite interested in fitness bands and smartwatches, driven by stylish designs and health tracking features.”

The market changes pose a significant challenge to traditional leaders like Apple, while other brands like Samsung and Xiaomi also expand their consumer bases with competitive products.

item.title: Unleashing the Kernel With eBPF - InfoQ.com
item.description:
Unleashing the Kernel With eBPF

Publication Date: Not specified Source: InfoQ

Liz Rice explores how eBPF enables customization of the kernel’s behavior, leading to enhanced networking and security capabilities.

  • eBPF allows dynamic loading of programs to modify kernel operations.
  • It enhances performance and reduces overhead in high-performance infrastructure.
  • Examples showcase eBPF's capabilities in mitigating network vulnerabilities.
  • eBPF presents a superior option for monitoring and tracing performance in cloud-native applications.
“eBPF is essential for performance testing.” - Brendan Gregg

This exploration of eBPF offers insights into its transformative impact on cloud-native environments, suggesting significant improvements in container networking and security management.

item.title: From CMF Phone 1 to Galaxy M15: Budget smartphones that made an impact in 2024 - The Indian Express
item.description:
From CMF Phone 1 to Galaxy M15: Noteworthy Budget Smartphones of 2024

Publication Date: 2024 Source: The Indian Express

2024 has been remarkable for smartphone enthusiasts, particularly first-time buyers. Despite budget smartphones typically lacking innovation, this year has seen significant advancements, particularly in the Rs 15,000 price range.

  • Demand for budget smartphones is rising alongside the interest in affordable 5G devices.
  • Notable models include the CMF Phone 1 for Rs 14,999, and the Samsung Galaxy M15 5G Prime Edition for Rs 11,999.
  • Innovative designs and modular compatibility were highlighted, especially with the HMD Fusion.
  • Most budget smartphones now offer at least 128 GB internal storage, and include expansions like microSD.
  • Samsung stands out with its commitment to software updates: four major OS upgrades and five years of security updates.
"With more feature phone users upgrading to smartphones, it is important to have a strong lineup of budget smartphones."

The 2024 budget smartphone market offered a variety of choices, signaling shifting trends in affordability and technological capability.

item.title: Tech News Today Live Updates on December 19, 2024: iPhone 16 now features Genmoji and Image Playground AI tools with iOS 18.2: How to get started | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Tech News Today Live Updates on December 19, 2024: Elon Musk calls hashtags ‘Unnecessary and Ugly,’ here's how users react

Date: 19 Dec, 2024 | Source: LiveMint

Elon Musk's recent comments labeling hashtags as 'unnecessary and ugly' have sparked diverse reactions across social media, highlighting the ongoing debate regarding their relevance and utility.

  • Musk's statement prompted a range of responses, with some users agreeing and others defending the role of hashtags in organizing content.
  • The discussion touches upon broader themes of social media communication and user engagement.
"Hashtags are both necessary and ugly. They help in organizing content but can clutter conversations." - User comment

The ongoing debate reflects the evolving discourse surrounding social media and user interaction, emphasizing the different perspectives on how technology shapes communication.

item.title: Sennheiser launches Profile Wireless, a wireless microphone system for creators - The Indian Express
item.description:
Sennheiser launches Profile Wireless, a wireless microphone system for creators

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: Indian Express

Sennheiser has introduced the Profile Wireless, a versatile wireless microphone system designed for creators and videographers, featuring multiple connectivity options.

  • Profile Wireless can be used as a clip-on mic or in handheld and tabletop modes.
  • The two-channel system easily connects to mobile phones, computers, and cameras.
  • Includes a multifunctional charging bar that stores and charges pre-paired mics with an OLED display.
  • Offers a range of up to 245 meters with 16GB onboard storage for 30 hours of audio recording.
  • Backup Recording Mode automatically activates under weak Wi-Fi signals.
  • Launch price is Rs 29,900 and availability is set for next year.
“Profile Wireless connects using a 2.4GHz network and has an integrated handheld option with a battery life of 15 hours.”

Sennheiser's Profile Wireless represents a significant development in wireless audio technology for content creators, providing innovative features for improved recording quality and functionality.

item.title: Android 16 Developer Preview 2 out now: Here are all the new features - The Times of India
item.description:
Android 16 Developer Preview 2 Out Now: Here are all the new features

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

The latest Android 16 Developer Preview 2 has been released, bringing exciting new features and improvements for developers and users alike.

  • Introduction of new user interface elements.
  • Enhanced privacy features to protect user data.
  • Performance optimizations for smoother operation.
  • New APIs for developers to utilize in their applications.
"Android 16 sets a new standard for user experience and developer tools." - Android Developer Team

This update promises to significantly enhance the overall functionality of Android, making it a more appealing choice for both developers and users.

item.title: ‘Game changer’: Instagram influencer reveals secret to ‘automatic weight loss’ | Today News - Mint
item.description:
‘Game changer’: Instagram influencer reveals secret to ‘automatic weight loss’

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Live Mint

Leana, an Instagram influencer, shares her weight loss journey and diet tips, focusing on replacing refined sugars with natural sugar options.

  • Leana lost over 7 kg in 2 months by following a diet rich in natural sugar.
  • She emphasizes that reducing refined sugar can keep one full and decrease hunger pangs.
  • Leana encourages striving for “progress, not perfection” in dietary habits.
  • Switching to natural sugars can help break sugar addiction.
  • Focus on better eating will resolve many health issues.
“Replacing refined sugar with natural options like fruits is a game-changer and will help you lose weight right away.” - Leana

In conclusion, Leana’s advice on dietary adjustments highlights the importance of mindful eating for effective weight loss.
